NOT USED: Welcome to the Department of Computer Science. You are now on the second floor of the extension building.For room number two six seven, walk to your right towards the main door, this is normally open but please exercise caution.
You have now entered the second floor of the Computer Science Department. When ready to go, wait for the notification alert and say "yes go on".

This waypoint is NEAR LIFTS and STAIRS B: Please start walking forward for about fifteen (15) steps. Then turn cautiously to the right and take the sub-level stairways containing four steps down towards the main corridor.
NOT USED: Keep walking forward for about ten (10) steps. Then turn cautiously to the right and take the sub-level stairways containing four steps down towards the main corridor.
Please be careful , confirm the presence of the four step sub-level stairway when you get there. When ready, please wait for the notification alert and say "yes go on".

This waypoint is FOUR STEPS and TOILETS: Be careful , use the hand rails and take the four step sub-level stairway down to the main corridor. This corridor is narrow and long, keep walking forward for about twenty five more (25) steps. At the end of this corridor take the sub-level stairways containing two steps up and turn to the right towards room number two six seven (267).
Confirm the presence of the two step sub-level stairway when you get there. When ready, please wait for the notification alert and say "yes go on".

This waypoint is TWO STEPS and STAIRS D: Use the hand rails and take the sub-level stairways containing two steps up and turn to the right towards room number two six seven (267). Keep walking forward for about fifteen (15) more steps. Room number two six seven (267) is at the end of this corridor, to the left passed a narrow open doorway.
This waypoint is ROOM 267: You have arrived to room number two six seven (267) which has its door in front of you.
Confirm the presence of the narrow open doorway when you get there. When ready, please wait for the notification alert and say "yes go on".

This waypoint is STAIRS E: Please start walking forward for about twenty five (25) steps. Then turn cautiously to the left and take the sub-level stairways containing four steps down towards the main corridor.
